Description.Text: Andron Hotel is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in east Moscow. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and a good location near Rimskaya metro station. Tagansky is a central district located on the east banks of the Moskva River. Nearby places of interest include Taganka Square, Rogozhskoye Cemetery, early 18th-century St Nicholas Church on Bolvanovka and the Art Nouveau Taganka Theatre. Several metro stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Moscow destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century low-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 10-12sqm and decorated in a bright, modern style with minimalist features and wood floors. Amenities include satellite TV and a work desk. Shared bathroom facilities are provided on every floor. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
